entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow ending early this morning then clearing. Blowing snow at times early this morning. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 AM CDT Friday 12 May 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 12.

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning with 60 percent chance of rain showers in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 early in the afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 AM CDT Friday 12 May 2023
